normalized: some of the guards tried to subdue asagi.
all of their faces were stiff from fear.
asagi had cut their lives short extremely casually.
compassion could not be sensed from her.
they were in the way, so she erased them.
it was that kind of action.

name: black
normalized: you accept the demon, yet still wish to kill me, asagi?
black stood up in the vip section.
a wry smile was suspended on his face.

name: black
normalized: even that, i could say, is just like you.
her dual demon swords drew streaks like bolts of lightning.
without even acting like he would, he just allowed himself to be hit by asagi's demonic swords.
black's body was cut to pieces.
what had come apart was black's black mist.
it had already started to regenerate into his original form.

name: asagi
normalized: it's useless, even with this power?!
asagi raised a voice of anger, and slashed at black over and over.
however, she couldn't cause any kind of effect.
exactly like she was trying to slash the moon reflected in the water's surface.

name: black
normalized: it looks like the human you is still getting in the way.
i will destroy that final fragment of your mind.
blades of black's mist skewered asagi's body.
her arms, legs, torso, and even her heart were pierced by the blades of darkness.
however, not a single drop of blood came out.
on the contrary, she felt at ease, like something that she had been missing was being filled.

name: black
normalized: the time has come, my sister.
that voice echoed in asagi's mind, along with indescribable relief.
asagi's “human” mind, which barely remained, raised a scream.

name: asagi
normalized: wh, what do you intend to do?
asagi's voice was drowned out by the loud cheering from the audience.
like when asagi had killed the guards.
the darkness that spread from him had engulfed the whole arena in an instant.
that darkness was drawing back like a wave.
the spectators had melted away, leaving only bones.
all of his subordinates, including hell knight ingrid and demonic specialist doctor furst, had been turned to ash.
dead silence dominated the demons' arena.

name: black
normalized: now, it's just you and me.
the dark mist began invading asagi.
more intensely than at that time.

name: black
normalized: finally, the time of regeneration has come.

name: black
normalized: whatever attachment you have to this present world.

name: black
normalized: you have lost everything, and become nothing.

name: black
normalized: let us pour the real world into your empty soul.

name: black
normalized: the two worlds, the world of humans and the world of demons.
they are nothing more than drops of water floating in our mother sea.

name: black
normalized: when two drops overlap while floating in the mother sea, their fate is settled to someday burst and become one.

name: black
normalized: now, purification is necessary to create a new world.

name: asagi
normalized: your objective wasn't to control this country?

name: black
normalized: anti-demon power is power that will interfere with the mother sea.

name: black
normalized: you and i, our souls are in the mother sea.
in the mother sea, creation and destruction are always two sides of the same coin.

name: black
normalized: it is our fate to return these two distorted worlds to the mother sea.

name: asagi
normalized: ahh, something really big, inside me, one with me, this is… space…?

name: asagi
normalized: an act of god like this, how are you…?!

name: black
normalized: the means to be connected to the mother sea is “gravitational force”.

name: asagi
normalized: are you saying the source of anti-demon power is gravity?

name: black
normalized: when we, who reflect in the water's surface in different ways, unite, the great demon age will begin.
a gate linked to the mother sea.
two drops of water were overlapping and becoming one.
everything was returning to the mother sea.
for the sake of new creation.
